title: No reward earned
body:
After running the beacon and validator- no rewards were earned:
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Start of a new epoch! epoch=15165 slot=121320
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Validator registry information numActiveValidators=600 totalValidators=721
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Generating validator performance report from the previous epoch...
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Average eth balance per active validator in the beacon chain averageEthBalance=3.566051
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Net gains/losses in eth delta=0.00000000 newBalance=3.189914872 percentChange=0.00000% prevBalance=3.189914872 pubKey=ab129b5c27e2
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: New assignment attesterSlot=121326 proposerSlot=Not proposing shard=0 status=ACTIVE validator=ab129b5c27e2
[2019-05-08 06:09:00]  INFO validator: Updated validator assignments assignments=1

beacon error:

[2019-05-08 05:05:56] ERROR initial-sync: Could not exit initial sync: b[0/1946]s not fulfill pre-processing conditions unprocessed parent block as it is not saved in the db: 0x1eb01c79df34b7b866d122617e970f918470da25f7497da1307f949c445731$7

ved in the db: 0x1eb01c79df34b7b866d122617e970f918470da25f7497da1307f949c4457314
7

now the status is EXITED
rom the previous epoch...
[2019-05-08 13:02:36] INFO validator: Average eth balance per active validator in the beacon chain averageEthBalance=3.575300
[2019-05-08 13:02:36] INFO validator: Net gains/losses in eth delta=0.00000000 newBalance=3.174776891 percentChange=0.00000% prevBalance=3.174776891 pubKey=ab129b5c27e2

[2019-05-08 13:02:36] INFO validator: Updated validator assignments assignments=1

Hey! Thanks for filing this. We resolved a few issues with sync today and you should be able sync and participate as a validator now. Your previous validator was ejected for not participating (at no fault of your own) so you'll need to create a new one. Follow the instructions on https://prylabs.net/participate to join as a new validator and be sure to follow step one to get the latest docker images. 

I'll close this for now, but feel free to open it up if you still have issues. Thanks!
